creator: DaleR18
title: 6061 Aluminum Clavichord
description: The edelan 6061 Clavichord is an all-aluminum, minimalist, contemporary instrument designed for music lovers with an appreciation for contemporary design. It is based on the clavichord, known for being the most expressive and intimate of keyboard instruments. The clavichord is built primarily of 6061 alloy aluminum and is re-engineered to be an all metal instrument.
steps: Re-engineer components like the soundboard, bridge, and hitchpin rail to be part of an all-metal instrument.
Construct the bridge (Benson Bridge) with a three-part layered aluminum construction, using holes instead of traditional bridge pins.
